title: New: Kanzi – Part 1
body:
Impressing us, and **Alt-J** (well Alt-J started following them on Soundcloud…) with their debut track, Water, Brighton’s **Kanzi** have followed it up with _Part 1_.

Centred around a killer hook, and relying more on the ‘slick’ production than their previous effort, it’s further proof that they have the potential to be rather special. Check out _Part 1_ below.
